data.name: How to Validate a Product Concept by former GoPro Sr Dir Product
data.summary:
Main takeaways:
- Learn a simple template for deciding whether or not to proceed with a product concept
- Understand what kind of Product Manager you are and how to best leverage your contribution to the organization
- How to approach achieving “buy in” from key stakeholders and what to do if you can’t get it
data.speakers:
Adam Silver
Adam has years of experience envisioning new initiatives, driving new product strategies, seeking out strategic partnerships, and building new teams from the ground up. He thrives on creating newness, delivering greatness and bringing value to the organization.
